name: Johann Hogstaff: My Bad Galaxy
description:
Welcome to this terrible galaxy! 

Your golden barge has been damaged by the extravagant radiations coming from the greasy vortex which just spit you up and you've crash landed on one of these hexes! Better get to work trying to find a way back home! Luckily you've found a small guidebook to this 7 hex little sphere, which should help you out! Maybe you'll find a way to traverse the middle hex and take the vortex back home! Or to another pocket sphere?

Art by Nate Treme, from his patreon.

Hex tiles from The Tiles of Xark by Nate Treme.

Johann Hogstaff’s My Bad Galaxy is an independent production by Roz and is not affiliated with the Melsonain arts council.
